profile.name: Star Wars - The Old Republic

macro.name: Set Focus Target / Swap Focus Target

profile.script:
function OnEvent(event, arg, family) if event == "PROFILE_ACTIVATED" then SetBacklightColor(255,80,0,"kb") SetBacklightColor(255,80,0,"lhc") end
if event == "G_PRESSED" and arg == zz15 then PressKey("lshift", "5") Sleep(25) ReleaseKey("lshift", "5") end
if event == "G_PRESSED" and arg == zz20 then PressKey("lshift", "6") Sleep(25) ReleaseKey("lshift", "6") end
if event == "G_RELEASED" and arg == zz15 then PressKey("lshift", "1") Sleep(25) ReleaseKey("lshift", "1") end
if event == "G_RELEASED" and arg == zz20 then PressKey("lshift", "1") Sleep(25) ReleaseKey("lshift", "1") end
end
